description.displayText: I worked with and supervised Jodie when she worked in the nursery at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Salt Lake City, Utah.  Jodie interacted really well with the children, ages 6 months through 5 years old.  She engaged them with age appropriate activities and stories.  She was creative with the children, and was able to handle the situations that came up on Sunday mornings.  Jodie is reliable, communicates well, and has a good working relationship with other staff members.  I am pleased to recommend Jodie for a position working with children.
description.originalText: I worked with and supervised Jodie when she worked in the nursery at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Salt Lake City, Utah.  Jodie interacted really well with the children, ages 6 months through 5 years old.  She engaged them with age appropriate activities and stories. description.displayText:
I have the pleasure of working with Jodie as her supervisor in a licensed child care facility.  She worked at our child care center mostly with infant and toddler aged children. 
Working with young children can be a very challenging position to hold, and Jodie had to overcome a lot as a new member of our team.  As one of our evening care providers, she occasionally will be in a classroom alone with toddlers and showed great team work abilities by stepping up and taking charge.  Jodie worked great in a team environment and often completed extra duties in order to support her coworkers. 
Jodie was an excellent part of our team and makes a great difference in the lives of the children we work with, as well as all the student parents we serve that are working toward graduation.  I recommend Jodie for any child care services.
